Text: Such a brilliant film. If you can, see it in a cinema -he loves his wide shots - but either way, you must see this.
Won Oscar for Best Foreign Film last night !

Thanx Zen_Bud that's very great print that you shared.

V-10
A-10
M-8
As far as it concern to the movie it is very great movie telling a usual situations at the elderly age. I like the direction (especially a screenplay) but I seriously missed the background music. Which I think Michael Haneke didn't add to make movie as simple as possible. Yet! that was needed. yet, Thanxx again.
